script:
1). How long has Carlos been with the firm?
A week from Tuesday.
Since 1997. 
Until next year.
2). What did William do with the invoices?
He submitted them to accounting. 
He will put them away later.
He didn't do them.
3). When will Mr. Howard return from Brazil?
Last Saturday.
He left on the 28th.
The day after tomorrow.
